header: The Parable of the Dishonest Manager

verse: He also said to the disciples, “There was a rich man who had a manager, and charges were brought to him that this man was wasting his possessions.

header: The Law and the Kingdom of God

verse: The Pharisees, who were lovers of money, heard all these things, and they ridiculed him.
And he said to them, “You are those who justify yourselves before men, but God knows your hearts. For what is exalted among men is an abomination in the sight of God.
